author: swertz
body:
#### PR description:

1. The electron cutBased and photon cutBased and MVA IDs (and new EA corrections for isolation) added in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/39963, https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/39927, https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/40045 did not follow the same convention for Run2 and Run3. This restores consistency by:
   - Run2: only provide Fall17V2-based IDs and isos with the "default" names (`cutBased`/`mvaID`/...)
   - Run3: provide the Winter22V1-based IDs with the "default" names (`cutBased`/`mvaID`/...), but keep the Fall17V2 variables with a `_Fall17V2` suffix as backup, as desired by @cms-sw/egamma-pog-l2  . Those should be dropped at some point later.
3. The electron+photon scale+smearing corrections are not available yet for Run3; the Run2 ones should not be applied for Run3 eras but the energy should be left uncorrected; Run3 corrections will be made available later with correctionlib.
   - This required excluding the `run2_egamma_2018` modifier from the `Run3` era, since it was carried over there from the `Run2_2018` era. From a quick search it seems this should not have unexpected effects elsewhere.

#### PR validation:

`runTheMatrix.py --what nano --site "" -l 2500.312,2500.501`

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Will require backport to 12_6_X for nanoV11 production.

FYI @cms-sw/egamma-pog-l2
title: Nano: restore consistency Run2/3 consistency between electron/photon IDs; remove scale+smearing correction for Run3
